title: Firefox - No shady privacy policies
description: Get the browser that protects what’s important
body: Get all the speed and tools with none of the invasions of privacy. Firefox Browser collects so little data about you, we don’t even require your email address to download. That’s because unlike other browsers, we have no financial stake in following you around the web.
author: Mozilla
